channel.title: Need help to convert my .bat files
channel.description:
Hi, i dont know if i posted this on right section or not but i have a problem with my rsps installed on ubuntu server. I'm kinda new to linux and dont get it that well. I have problem with my run and compile scripts. However i write them they get me errors. Could someone please write me working .sh scripts. My .bat files:
compiler.bat: @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_51 in\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/netty.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model
pcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server	ask\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\content\skill\*.java src\server
et\login\*.java src\server
et\*.java pause
run.bat: @echo off title PI Reloaded "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.7.0_51 in\java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp build/classes;deps/poi.jar;deps/netty.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

item.title: Need help to convert my .bat files
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You can’t use batch files on Linux afaik, convert them to shell (.sh). Check out this little thread.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help to convert my .bat files

item.title: Need help to convert my .bat files
item.dc:creator: @tazrik tazrik
item.description:
@tazrik wrote:

Hi, i dont know if i posted this on right section or not but i have a problem with my rsps installed on ubuntu server. I’m kinda new to linux and dont get it that well.
I have problem with my run and compile scripts. However i write them they get me errors. Could someone please write me working .sh scripts.
My .bat files:

compiler.bat:
@echo off
Title Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_51\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/netty.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\content\skill*.java src\server\net\login*.java src\server\net*.java
pause

run.bat:
@echo off
title PI Reloaded
"C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.7.0_51\bin\java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp build/classes;deps/poi.jar;deps/netty.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

Read full topic
item.source: Need help to convert my .bat files
